The number of MB of Process Resident Size (RSS) for the MarkLogic process.
The number of MB of Process Anonymous Memory for the MarkLogic process.
The number of MB of total process virtual memory for the MarkLogic process.
The number of MB of memory swapped out for the MarkLogic process.
The maximum (High Water Mark) of Process Resident Size (RSS) in MB for the MarkLogic process.
The size of huge pages for the MarkLogic process in MB. Available on Linux platform. Sum of Sizes after /anon_hugepage in /proc/[MLpid]/smaps
The total system memory in MB. MemTotal from /proc/meminfo on Linux, m.ullTotalPhys from GlobalMemoryStatusEx(m) on Windows.
The free system memory in MB. MemFree from /proc/meminfo on Linux, m.ullAvailPhys from GlobalMemoryStatusEx(m) on Windows.
The page in rate for the system in pages/sec.
The page out rate for the system in pages/sec.
The swap in rate for the system in pages/sec.
The swap out rate for the system in pages/sec.
Size of virtual memory mapped to data files.
Size of virtual memory used by forests.
Size of virtual memory used by unclosed stands.
Size of virtual memory used by caches.
Size of virtual memory used to store registered queries.
Size of virtual memory used for join processing.
The number of bytes received by the xdqp client for host communications. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to receive xdqp client communication. Deprecated.
Throughput of the xdqp client receiving data, in megabytes per second.
Time threads spent receiving data for the xdqp client, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
The number of bytes sent by the xdqp client for host communications. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send xdqp client communication. Deprecated.
Throughput of the xdqp client sending data, in megabytes per second.
Time threads spent sending data for the xdqp client, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.

Time threads spent receiving data for the xdqp server, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
The number of bytes sent by the xdqp server for host communications. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send xdqp server communication. Deprecated.
Throughput of sending data from the xdqp server, in megabytes per second.
Time threads spent sending data for the xdqp server, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
Average response time of XDQP requests from other nodes.
Number of XDQP requests processed per second.

The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to receive xdqp client communication. Deprecated.

The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send xdqp server communication. Deprecated.
Throughput of the foreign xdqp server sending data, in megabytes per second.

Number of requests per second to the external key management server.
Average round-trip time for a request to an external key management server.
The kek-encryption-rate.
The kek-encryption-load.
The kek-decryption-rate.
The kek-decryption-load.

The total data size of all forests on the host. The size is calculated by adding the fast data directory size and the data directory size for each forest on this host, but it does not include any content stored in the large data directory.
The total size of all large binary data on the host.
The number of MB left on log device.
The number of MB left on data dir.
The number of bytes read from external binary documents.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data from external binary documents.
Disk read throughput of external binary documents, in megabytes per second.
Disk read time threads spent on external binary documents, in proportion to the elapsed time.
The total number of read lock acquisitions, summed across all forests on the host. Deprecated.
The rate of read lock acquisitions, summed across all forests on the host.
Time threads spent waiting for read locks in proportion to the elapsed time, summed across all forests on the host.
Time threads spent holding read locks in proportion to the elapsed time, summed across all forests on the host
The total number of write lock acquistions, summed across all forests on the host. Deprecated.
The rate of write lock acquisitions, summed across all forests on the host.
Time threads spent waiting to acquire write locks in proportion to the elapsed time, summed across all forests on the host.
Time threads spent holding write locsk in proportion to the elapsed time, summed across all forests on the host.
The number of deadlocks, summed across all forests on the host. Deprecated.
The rate of deadlock occurrances, summed across all forests on the host.
Time threads spent waiting for locks that eventually result in deadlocks in proportion to the elapsed time, summed across all forests on the host.
Time threads spent holding locks that eventually result in deadlocks in proportion to the elapsed time, summed across all forests on the host.
A server unique id (64-bit value)
A server name.
A kind of server.
The number of server threads.

average of request time for this server.
The number of tasks in the server queue.

The number of misses on the expanded cache.

The number of bytes received over the network. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to receive over the network. Deprecated.
Incoming network throughput, in megabytes per second.
Network time threads spent receiving data, in proportion to the elapsed time.
The number of bytes sent over the network. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to send over the network. Deprecated.
Outgoing network throughput, in megabytes per second.
Network time threads spent sending data, in proportion to the elapsed time.
The number of bytes read off disk. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read query data from disk. Deprecated.
Throughput of reading query data from disk, in megabytes per second.
Disk reading time threads spent for a query in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
The number of bytes written to the journal on disk. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data to the journal. Deprecated.
Throughput of writing data to the journal, in megabytes per second.
Journal writing time threads spent in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.
The number of bytes written when saving in-memory stands. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) spent saving in-memory stands. Deprecated.
Throughput of writing data to in-memory stands, in megabytes per second.
Time spent writing to in-memory stands, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.
The number of bytes read during merges. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data for merges. Deprecated.
Throughput of reading merge data from disk, in megabytes per second.
Disk read time threads spent during merge, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
The number of bytes written to disk for merges. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data for merges. Deprecated.
Throughput of writing data for merges, in megabytes per second.
Disk writing time threads spent for merges, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.
The number of bytes read from disk for backups. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data for backups. Deprecated.
Throughput of reading backup data from disk, in megabytes per second.
Disk read time threads spent for backup, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
The number of bytes written to disk for backups. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data to backups. Deprecated.
Throughput of writing data for backups, in megabytes per second.
Disk writing time threads spent for backups, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.
The number of bytes read from disk for restores. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data for restores. Deprecated.
Disk read throughput for restore, in megabytes per second.
Disk read time threads spent for restore, in proportion to the elapsed time. This is summed for all of the contributing threads.
The number of bytes written to disk for restores. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to write data for restores. Deprecated.
Disk writing throughput for restore, in megabytes per second.
Disk write time threads spent for restores, in proportion to the elasped time. This is summed for all of the threads writing on the host.
The number of bytes read from large documents. Deprecated.
The time (as xs:dayTimeDuration) to read data from large documents. Deprecated.
